subject: ak lurid twiddle
body:
As a business you have been preapproved to receive 41389 USD TODAY!

No hassle at all, completely unsecured.

Turn your dream, into a reality, is that not worth two minutes of your time?

1~877~482~4956

"Now, going back to the subject of the paper - "Ill get you your cockadoodie paper,she said sullenly. She finished struggling into her coat and stopped shaking her finger long enough to rake the zipper up.

Waldo Boyle
